>

</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>

<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 73

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Demon's Lantern_ represents trickery and feats of legerdemain. As long as you have _The Demon's Lantern_ invested, you gain a +2 item bonus to checks made to [Conceal an Object](/Actions.aspx?ID=61), [Palm an Object](/Actions.aspx?ID=67), or [Steal](/Actions.aspx?ID=68). This increases to a +3 item bonus if you are at least 17th level.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** A creature hits you with a melee attack;  **Effect** You release a flash of lights and attempt a Reflex saving throw. If your saving throw is higher than the attack roll for the triggering attack, it misses. If the attack misses, the attacker is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) until the end of your next turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
